title: Add ADB and Fastboot support for Android devices
body: To be able to access Android devices for developer/diagnostic tasks.

comments.body:
Already works, you just need to install it (so you dont need to use the buggy windows tools anymore ;-) ):
sudo apt update
sudo apt install android-tools-adb android-tools-fastboot
Source: https://www.linuxbabe.com/ubuntu/how-to-install-adb-fastboot-ubuntu-16-04-16-10-14-04
